conbody.p: (2)(ii) If the contracting officer considers that the nonavailability of an article is likely to affect future acquisitions, the contracting officer shall submit the determinations made under FAR 25.103(b)(2) to DASN(P) by email at RDAJ&As.fct @navy.mil with the subject “[Activity Name] DFARS 225.103 - Buy American Act--Supplies Determination.”
